function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Studies on the susceptibility of different viruses to UV irradiation could lead to the underestimation of the risk of contagion in real-world scenarios.","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the effectiveness of UV irradiation in controlling the propagation of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conduct studies that replicate real-world scenarios to accurately assess the effectiveness of UV irradiation on different viruses.","Technologies":"Realistic simulation chambers, advanced airflow modeling and particle dispersion analysis.","People":"Research institutions, epidemiologists, building engineers.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, building industry associations."},{"Description":"Limited experimental studies on the UV irradiation of aerosolized viruses may result in a lack of understanding of the efficacy of UV treatment on airborne transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inadequate knowledge of the effectiveness of UV irradiation in controlling airborne transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Invest in more experimental studies on the UV irradiation of aerosolized viruses to fill the knowledge gap.","Technologies":"Aerosol chambers, airborne virus detection devices, advanced UV-C irradiation systems.","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies, aerosol scientists.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, aerosol technology firms."}]}
